named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORY_XREF_BY_CATEGORYID
named-query.query: SELECT categoryXref FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryXrefImpl categoryXref WHERE CATEGORY_ID = :categoryId

named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORY_XREF_BY_SUBCATEGORYID
named-query.query: SELECT categoryXref FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryXrefImpl categoryXref WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_ID = :subCategoryId

named-query.name: BC_READ_CATEGORY_XREF_BY_IDS
named-query.query: SELECT categoryXref FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryXrefImpl categoryXref WHERE CATEGORY_ID = :categoryId AND SUB_CATEGORY_ID = :subCategoryId
